stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Purchase Order Themed Phishing Email Attachment Identified as Sohanad.B Worm
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 26 January 2015, a third party reported two phishing emails that contained malware, sent from an envelope address of info@msc.com. The emails used a Purchase Order theme. The attached file kIq5pa5.exe (MD5 1dc1f1682f2a95c351435a7f867535d0) was identified as the sohanad.b worm.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: No email headers or body were provided.

This file is associated with the sohanad.b worm. It was reported that the malware installs itself to the C:\Windows\System32\Microsoft\ directory under generic file names, such as svhost32.exe and rvhost.exe. The malware is capable of disabling processes such as antivirus, Windows Task Manager and Registry Editor. Like many malware programs, the Sohanad.b worm can also load additional malware. Sohanad.b worm is coded with the AutoIt scripting language and possesses the ability to self-replicate through its use of AutoRun registry entries.
